title.bibl: Otthon, March 21, 1926. Committee of Hungarian Priests for Eucharistic Congress

div.bibl: Otthon, March 21, 1926. COMMITTEE OF HUNGARIAN PRIESTS FOR EUCHARISTIC CONGRESS

body.p: p.1...Last Monday most of the Hungarian Roman Catholic priests in America met in Chicago to discuss plans for receiving the 1,000 delegates to the Eucharistic Congress from Hungary. Archbishop Mundelein asked Rev. Soltesz to take charge of the Hungarian group.
The Eucharistic Congress will begin June 20th,and will last four days. This will be the 28th International Congress.
